Group_block

Superclass representing a block record from a group blocking a user.

Properties

  • __table = ‘group_block’; // table name
  • group_id; // int(4) primary_key not_null
  • blocked; // int(4) primary_key not_null
  • blocker; // int(4) not_null
  • modified; // timestamp() not_null default_CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
